message: “Based on data from the National Human Trafficking Hotline, human sex traffickers frequently capitalize on the anonymity at hotels and motels for the purpose of trafficking,” said DCF Secretary Eloise Anderson in a statement. “This training is just one of many tools we’ve added to our toolbox to help put a stop to this horrible crime.”

data.description: Hotels, motels, and inns throughout Wisconsin are getting more resources to help fight human trafficking. The Wisconsin Department of Children and Families and Department of Justice have partnered to…
data.title: Hotels get new state resources to fight human trafficking
